sentences.sentence: These fibers are, in fact, mainly cholinergic.
sentences.translation: 实际上这些纤维主要是胆碱能神经纤维。

sentences.sentence: Objective To study the dynamic changes of cholinergic system after cerebral infarction.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨脑梗死后胆碱能神经系统的变化特点。

sentences.sentence: Each of these symptoms can be traced back to excessive stimulation of cholinergic neurons.
sentences.translation: 这些症状归因于大量的胆碱能神经细胞的刺激。
